subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With 17 games to play last season, the Mets held a seven-game lead over the Phillies. Now, with 100 games remaining in 2008, the Mets trail the Phillies by an almost identical margin.
snippet: With 17 games to play last season, the Mets held a seven-game lead over the Phillies. Now, with 100 games remaining in 2008, the Mets trail the Phillies by an almost identical margin.
